column4: does anyone know what latex is? a program? a language? a set of both?
I would probably describe it as an environment. It has binary stuff, lots of scripts and I seem to remember that it differs from TeX language-wise.
so i can say to someone who is looking for some program to do latex in linux, that texlive is one?
Hmm, I'm not sure texlive includes an editor. But you can definately compile latex using texlive.
Personally I use Eclipse + TeXlipse for LaTeX editing, but I think some might find that to be excessive :P
